Content: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Deputy leader of the UNP Minister Sajith Premadasa noted that he informed the Working Committee that he is prepared to take up responsibilities. The Senpathi Nandimithragama that has 39 houses was constructed at Ballagaswewa, Hambantota was vested with the public under the auspices of Minister Sajith Premadasa. This is the 229th model village constructed under the “Samata Sewana Yali Pibidena Uda Gammana” project. Following the official opening, the Minister was felicitated by the people who attended the event. He was escorted to location of the felicitation by a cheering crowd of by the overwhelming supporters. Minister Sajith Premadasa, Deputy Leader of the UNP addressed the crowd and noted that he had informed the Working Committee that he is more than prepared to take up the responsibility of leading this nation to prosperity. He added that he would do what is necessary for the sake of the generations to come. He added that the election is nothing to be afraid of and he is prepared for anything.
